Class IPPacket

java.lang.Object
  com.att.aro.pcap.Packet
      com.att.aro.pcap.IPPacket
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
TCPPacket, UDPPacket
public class IPPacket
extends Packet
implements java.io.Serializable

A bean class that provides access to IP Packet data.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Method Detail

getDataOffset

public int getDataOffset()
Description copied from class: Packet
This method returns the offset into the data array where the payload of the packet starts. Subclasses should override this to give proper data offset excluding enclosed headers.

Overrides:
getDataOffset in class Packet
Returns:
The offset within the data array of the packet data excluding the header info
See Also:
Packet.getDataOffset()

getPayloadLen

public int getPayloadLen()
Description copied from class: Packet
Returns the length of the data portion of the packet. Subclasses should override this method to identify their specific payload.

Overrides:
getPayloadLen in class Packet
Returns:
The payload length.
See Also:
Packet.getPayloadLen()

getIPVersion

public byte getIPVersion()
Gets the IP version for IPv4 and IPv6.

Returns:
A byte value that is the IP version. A value of 4 indicates IPv4.

getPriority

public byte getPriority()
Gets the priority value for the IPPacket. In Pv4 this is TOS, and in Pv6 it is Traffic Class.

Returns:
A byte value that is the priority value.

getPacketLength

public int getPacketLength()
Gets the length of the packet including the header.

Returns:
An int value that is the length of the packet in bytes.

isRsvFrag

public boolean isRsvFrag()
Gets the value of the Fragmentation Reservation flag. (IPv4 only)

Returns:
A boolean value that is the Fragmentation Reservation flag.

isDontFrag

public boolean isDontFrag()
Gets the value of the Don't Fragment flag. (IPv4 only)

Returns:
A boolean value that is the Don’t Fragment flag.

isMoreFrag

public boolean isMoreFrag()
Gets the value of the More Fragment flag. (IPv4 only)

Returns:
A boolean value that is the More Fragment flag.

getFragmentOffset

public short getFragmentOffset()
gets the fragment offset.(IPv4 only)

Returns:
A short value that is the fragment offset.

getTimeToLive

public short getTimeToLive()
Gets theTime to Live (TTL) value. (IPv4 only)

Returns:
A short that is the TTL value.

Gets the protocol for the IPPacket.
